definitions: Attempt to explain or justify (one's own or another's behavior or attitude) with logical, plausible reasons, even if these are not true or appropriate.
Make (a company, process, or industry) more efficient by introducing more systematic methods or organization.
Convert (a fraction or expression) to an equivalent form in which the denominator is rational.
examples: She tried to rationalize her decision to quit her job.
The company decided to rationalize its production process.
You need to rationalize the denominator of this fraction.
